translations.source: 17.1.1 实际操作培训和理论培训
translations.target: 17.1.1 Practical Operation Training and Theoretical Training

translations.source: 中钢设备负责提供有关人员理论培训的资料。如部分业主员工需要来中国培训，中钢设备帮助安排在中国同类型炼焦厂进行培训。在工程现场，中钢设备工程师将对业主的人员进行理论和实际操作培训。
translations.target: Sinosteel Equipment is responsible for providing materials for theoretical training of relevant personnel. If some of the Owner's employees need to come to China for training, Sinosteel Equipment will assist in arranging training at similar coking plants in China. At the project site, Sinosteel Equipment engineers will conduct theoretical and practical operation training for the Owner's personnel.
